Déjà Vu / Freefalling

Listen Buy Physical Buy Digital Stream
Format: Vinyl 12-inch, Digital
Release Date: 23rd February 2015
Label: International Feel
Saxophone: Luke Marzec
Electric Guitar: Nat Reading

When we were looking for a home for our debut single, we were looking for a label in the electronic music world that “got” pop music and wasn’t afraid to bring its immediacy to the dancefloor. Having grown up in Sheffield in the 80s, International Feel’s Mark Barrott “gets” synth-pop and clearly understood what we were grasping at: a 12’’ single with two extended pop tracks. They’re a rare currency these days, but that wasn’t always the case.

Deja Vu emerged from an attempt at trying to evoke the feeling of the time that soul met synthesisers, shoulder pads took Sheffield by storm and disco’s finest decamped to that sonic Caribbean playground, Compass Point.

"An Artist You Should Know"

– KCRW
Previous release: Freefalling - Cafe Mambo Sunsets
Next release: Do It Thin
